Generating the Evidence Section of a Rating Decision
The
Evidence
section
can beÂ generated by importing evidence listed in VBMS or can be manually created through user input in VBMS-R.
Important
:
When importing evidence from VBMS, the
Evidence
section should always be checked for accuracy and completeness.
title: M21-1, Part V, Subpart iv, Chapter 1, Section A - Completing the Rating Decision Narrative
